definition-item.definition-title: PREPARING CLAY; PRODUCING MIXTURES CONTAINING CLAY OR CEMENTITIOUS MATERIAL, e.g. PLASTER (preparing material for foundry moulds B22C5/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: Classification of preparind clay; Producing mixtures containing clay or cementitious material is in this subclass.
Classification of cements; concrete and ceramics per se is classified under C04B. Mixing is classified under B01F.
The preceding image includes references to B28C, C04B, B01F.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Concrete paving mixers combined with distributing devices
Machines for preparing mixtures of road-metal with bitumen

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mixtures of cement with other substances

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus or methods for obtaining or processing clay (filtration in general B01D; separation of solids from solids B03, B07; chemical part C04B; by mining or quarrying E21C41/16, E21C41/26, E21C47/10)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: for producing or processing clay suspensions {, e.g. slip} (producing or processing suspensions in general B01)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C1/02.

definition-item.definition-title: for processing clay-containing substances in non-fluid condition (clay slurries B28C1/02 ){; Plants}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C1/10.

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus or methods for mixing clay with other substances (producing clay suspensions B28C1/02)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Compositions of mortars, concrete or artificial stone containing unburned clay

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus or methods for producing mixtures of cement with other substances, e.g. slurries, mortars, porous or fibrous compositions (controlling the mixing apparatus and supplying the ingredients B28C7/00 {; separating cement from waste concrete B03B9/063})

section-body.paragraph-text: Classification of apparatus or methods for producing mixtures is classified under this subclass.
without using driven mechanical means effecting the mixing is classified under B28C5/02.
using driven mechanical means effecting the mixing is classified under B28C5/08.
mixing in containers not actuated is classified under B28C5/10.
mixing in containers to which motion is imparted is classified under B28C5/18.
mixing on or by conveyors is classified under B28C5/34.
mixing effected by the action of a fluid and by driven mechanical means is classified under B28C5/38.
for preparing mixtures containing fibres is classified under B28C5/40.
adapted for being mounted on vehicles and mixing during transport is classified under B28C5/42.
super-or sub-atmospheric pressure during mixing is classified under B28C5/46.
mixing effected by vibrations is classified under B28C5/48.

definition-item.definition-title: without using driven mechanical means effecting the mixing (B28C5/48 takes precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/02.

definition-item.definition-title: {Mixing guns or nozzles; Injector mixers (applying plaster by gas pressure E04F21/12; both conveying and distributing concrete E04G21/04; conveying concrete B65G53/32; accelerating or decelerating material flow in troughs or tubes B65G53/58)}

section-body.paragraph-text: In patent documents the following words "gunnite", "shotcrete" and "aircrete" are often used.

definition-item.definition-title: using driven mechanical means affecting the mixing (B28C5/40, B28C5/42, B28C5/48 take precedence; in combination with the action of a fluid B28C5/38)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/08.

definition-item.definition-title: Mixing in containers not actuated to effect the mixing

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/10.
Classification of mixing in containers not actuated to effect the mixing is classified in this subclass.
mixing with stirrers sweeping through the material is classified under B28C5/12.
discontinuously operating mixing devices is classified under B28C5/1223.
material flowing continuously through the mixing device is classified under B28C5/1238.
the stirrers having a substantially horizontal axis is classified under B28C5/14.
the stirrers having a substantially vertical axis is classified under B28C5/16.

definition-item.definition-title: with stirrers sweeping through the materials {, e.g. with incorporated feeding or discharging means or with oscillating stirrers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/12.
Examples of places where the subject matter of this place is covered when specially adapted, used for a particular purpose, or incorporated in a larger system:

table-column.paragraph-text: Vehicle with moving mixing tools in a stationary container for mixing during transport

definition-item.definition-title: the stirrers having motion about a horizontal or substantially horizontal axis {(with feeding or discharging means B28C5/12)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/14.

definition-item.definition-title: {the stirrer shaft carrying screw-blades}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/142.

definition-item.definition-title: the stirrers having motion about a vertical or steeply inclined axis {(with feeding or discharging means B28C5/12)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

definition-item.definition-title: Mixing in containers to which motion is imparted to effect the mixing

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The motion which is imparted to the container to effect the mixing is non-rotational, e.g. rocking back and forth; axial reciprocating movement of the container.
Examples of places where the subject matter of this place is covered when specially adapted, used for a particular purpose, or incorporated in a larger system:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus specilly adapted for being mounted on vehicles with provision for mixing during transport

section-body.paragraph-text: Mixing in containers to which rotating motion is imparted are to be classified in the hierarchically lower subgroups of the B28C5/18.
rotating about an inclined axis is classified under B28C5/1806.
tilted-drum type mixers is classified under B28C5/1825.
pulling the mixer over the ground or driven by the wheel of a vehicle is classified under B28C5/1893.
rotating about a (substantially) horizontal axis classified is under B28C5/20.
rotating about a (substantially) vertical axis is classified under B28C5/25.

definition-item.definition-title: {rotating about an inclined axis (about a steeply inclined axis B28C5/26)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/1806.

definition-item.definition-title: {Mixers of the tilted-drum type, e.g. mixers pivotable about an axis perpendicular to the axis of rotation for emptying}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/1825.

definition-item.definition-title: {having several drums}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/1843.

definition-item.definition-title: {the mixing drum being rotated by pulling it over the ground; the mixing drum or the stirrer being driven by movement of the wheel of a vehicle}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/1893.

definition-item.definition-title: rotating about a horizontal or substantially horizontal axis during mixing, e.g. without independent stirrers

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/20.

definition-item.definition-title: rotating about a vertical or steeply inclined axis during the mixing {, e.g. comprising a flat bottomplate rotating about a vertical axis, co-operating with blades or stirrers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/26.

definition-item.definition-title: Mixing on or by conveyors {, e.g. by belts or chains provided with mixing elements}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/34.

definition-item.definition-title: wherein the mixing is effected both by the action of a fluid and by directly-acting driven mechanical means, e.g. stirring means {; Producing cellular concrete}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/38.

definition-item.definition-title: Mixing specially adapted for preparing mixtures containing fibres

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/40.

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus specially adapted for being mounted on vehicles with provision for mixing during transport ({B28C5/1893 takes precedence; mounted on a wheelbarrow B28C5/1215, B28C5/1818, B28C5/2018; } vehicle aspect B60P3/16)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/42.

definition-item.definition-title: {telescopic or foldable chutes}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/4251.

definition-item.definition-title: Apparatus specially adapted for drive by muscle power

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/44.

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements for applying super- or sub-atmospheric pressure during mixing; Arrangements for cooling or heating during mixing {, e.g. by introducing vapour}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/46.

definition-item.definition-title: wherein the mixing is effected by vibrations (mixers with vibrating mechanisms in general B01F31/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C5/48.

definition-item.definition-title: {Storage or weighing apparatus for supplying ingredients (B28C7/04 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C7/0046.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Controlling the operation of the mixing

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Methods, systems and apparatus for controlling in general

definition-item.definition-title: Supplying or proportioning the ingredients {(B28C7/022 takes precedence; forming a predetermined ratio of the components to be mixed, in general B01F35/80)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Classification of supplying or proportioning the ingredients is in this subclass.
proportioning is classified under B28C7/0404.
weighing is classified under B28C7/0422.
volumetric is classified under B28C7/0454.
plant for proportioning supplying or batching is classified under B28C7/0481.
supplying the solid ingredients is classified under B28C7/06.
supplying or proportioning the lliquid ingredientsis classified under B28C7/12.

definition-item.definition-title: {using a weighing belt or the like}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Discharge means {, e.g. with intermediate storage of fresh concrete}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C7/16.

definition-item.definition-title: General arrangement or layout of plant {(B28C7/0061, B28C7/0481 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C9/00.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: the plant being mobile, {e.g. mounted on a carriage or a set of carriages} (B28C5/42, {B28C9/004, B28C9/006} take precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in B28C9/04.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Hydraulic cement concrete mixers combined with distributing means specially adapted for road building
